00016 Segmenter::Segmenter ()
00017     :   inkValue_(0), shapes_(std::vector<Shape>(0)), thresholdingTime_(0.0), floodFillingTime_(0.0), seeds_(std::vector<Pixel>(0))
00018 {
00019

00022 
00027 void Segmenter::applyThreshold (Clip &clip, const unsigned char &threshold, const unsigned char &backgroundReference)
00028 {
00029     // Start timing
00030     boost::timer timer;
00031     timer.restart();
00032     
00033     
00034     // Threshold every pixel
00035     for (unsigned int i=0; i < clip.height(); ++i)
00036     {
00037         for (unsigned int j=0; j < clip.width(); ++j)
00038         {
00039             unsigned char grayLevel = clip.getPixelGrayLevel(i, j);
00040             
00041             if ( (backgroundReference >= threshold) and (grayLevel >= threshold) )  // The background is near white
00042                 clip.setPixelGrayLevel(i, j, 255);
00043             else
00044             {
00045                 if ( (backgroundReference >= threshold) and (grayLevel < threshold) )
00046                     clip.setPixelGrayLevel(i,j, 0);
00047                 else
00048                 {
00049                     if ( (backgroundReference < threshold) and (grayLevel < threshold) )    // The background is near black
00050                         clip.setPixelGrayLevel(i,j, 0);
00051                     else
00052                         clip.setPixelGrayLevel(i,j, 255);
00053                 }
00054             }   
00055         }
00056     }
00057     
00058     // Stablish the value of the ink pixels
00059     if ( backgroundReference >= threshold )
00060         inkValue_ = 0;
00061     else
00062         inkValue_ = 255;
00063     
00064     // Gather elapsed time
00065     thresholdingTime_ = timer.elapsed();
00066 };

00074 void Segmenter::applyFloodFill (const Clip &clip)
00075 {
00076     // Start timing
00077     boost::timer timer;
00078     timer.restart();
00079     
00080     
00081     // Find the seeds where the flooding process will start from
00082     findSeeds(clip);
00083     
00084     
00088     
00092 
00093     
00094     // Gather elapsed time
00095     floodFillingTime_ = timer.elapsed();
00096 };
00097 
00098 
00103 void Segmenter::findSeeds (const Clip &clip)
00104 {
00105     // Get the pixels of the clip (this is faster than calling clip.getPixelGrayLevel() each time)
00106     std::vector<unsigned char> pixels = clip.pixels();
00107     
00108     // Explore the whole clip adding the ink pixels
00109     for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < clip.height(); ++i )
00110     {
00111         for ( unsigned int j = 0; j < clip.width(); ++j )
00112         {
00113             if ( pixels[i * clip.width() + j] == inkValue_ )
00114                 seeds_.push_back(Pixel(i, j));
00115         }
00116     }
00117 };
